name: brawler-excess
headline: Brawlers in Bliss!
article: Brawlers are so satisfied by their current living conditions that the word has spread! 5 new brawlers have joined the town this morning, ready to punch anything and everything.

name: outrider-excess
headline: Outriders Overjoyed!
article: Outriders are so satisfied by their current living conditions that the word has spread! 5 new outriders have joined the town this morning, all plotting their mischievous schemes.

name: performer-excess
headline: Performers Pleased!
article: Performers are so satisfied by their current living conditions that the word has spread! 5 new performers have joined the town this morning, searching for an audience and some coin.

name: diviner-excess
headline: Diviners Delighted!
article: Diviners are so satisfied by their current living conditions that the word has spread! 5 new diviners have joined the congregation, riding into town on some very high-horses.

name: arcanist-excess
headline: Arcanists Awestruck!
article: Arcanists are so satisfied by their current living conditions that the word has spread! 5 new arcanists have joined the town this morning, already preparing some inscrutable spells.
